game.name: Batamonisk
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Subtitle Options, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Batamonisk is an RPG action game with a fairly short story. Taking around 2 hours at most for the main story. A Story consisting of a holy dragon and a demon king, Even mentions of a demon god. I ask of you Nakato, Will you uncover this story in full? Or are you becoming a part of it?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Batamonisk is an RPG action game with a fairly short story. Taking around 2 hours at most for the main story. A Story consisting of a holy dragon and a demon king, Even mentions of a demon god. I ask of you Nakato, Will you uncover this story in full? Or are you becoming a part of it?
